items.name: what
items.title: What is Novel Character Name Generator
items.description: Novel Character Name Generator is an online tool designed for writers and creative professionals, helping generate unique and meaningful character names. By combining literary styles, cultural backgrounds, and personality traits, it provides diverse name options to help you easily create fascinating characters.

items.title: Diverse Name Styles
items.description: Whether it's classical, modern, or fantasy style, we can provide suitable names for you.

items.title: Precise Character Creation
items.description: Customize names based on character personality and background to enhance story depth.

items.title: Quick Online Generation
items.description: Simple input, instant generation, making the creative process more efficient.

items.name: how
items.title: How to Use Novel Character Name Generator
items.description: Using our tool is very simple, follow these steps to generate ideal character names:

items.title: 1. Enter Character Description
items.description: Provide character personality traits and background description.

items.title: 2. Choose Name Style
items.description: Select preferred name style, such as classical, modern, or fantasy style.

items.title: 3. Get Name Suggestions
items.description: System will quickly generate multiple name suggestions based on your description.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions About Novel Character Name Generator
faq.description: Answers to common questions you might encounter while using our tool.

items.title: What styles does Novel Character Name Generator support?
items.description: The tool supports classical, modern, fantasy, and many other styles to meet different creative needs.

items.title: Do I need to register to use Novel Character Name Generator?
items.description: No registration needed for free use, but registering allows you to save names and access more advanced features.

items.title: Can I generate names for different types of works?
items.description: Yes, you can generate suitable names for novels, scripts, or games.

defaultNames.name: Raven Blackthorn
defaultNames.description: A name combining the mysterious raven with the gothic blackthorn, suggesting a dark and enigmatic character. Common in gothic fantasy and dark romance novels, often associated with mysterious powers or troubled past.
defaultNames.review: Perfect for dark fantasy or gothic romance protagonists.

defaultNames.name: Sterling Nightshade
defaultNames.description: Sterling implies nobility and worth, while Nightshade adds a dangerous, poisonous element. Suitable for an anti-hero or noble villain in fantasy novels.
defaultNames.review: Balanced blend of aristocratic and dangerous elements.

defaultNames.name: Aurora Moonweaver
defaultNames.description: Combines celestial Aurora with the mystical Moonweaver. Typically represents a magical character with ties to celestial or lunar powers in fantasy fiction.
defaultNames.review: Excellent for magical or ethereal female characters in fantasy.

defaultNames.name: Drake Ironheart
defaultNames.description: Drake suggests dragon heritage, while Ironheart implies strength and determination. Common in epic fantasy for warrior characters or dragon-related protagonists.
defaultNames.review: Strong heroic name suitable for fantasy protagonists.

faq.question: How many names can I generate with one credit?
faq.answer: One credit allows you to generate up to 10 character names with detailed backgrounds and descriptions.

faq.question: Do credits expire?
faq.answer: Basic plan credits are valid for 1 year. Professional plan credits never expire.

faq.question: Can I upgrade my plan later?
faq.answer: Yes, you can upgrade to the Professional plan at any time. Your remaining credits will be converted accordingly.

faq.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.answer: We accept all major credit cards, PayPal, and other popular payment methods.
